# Copilot module context (JetBrains)

JetBrains Copilot auto-loads **only** `.github/copilot-instructions.md`.

This folder also contains optional, deeper module notes you can reference in Copilot Chat when working on a specific module:

- `.github/copilot-jasypt-spring-boot.md`
- `.github/copilot-jasypt-spring-boot-starter.md`
- `.github/copilot-jasypt-maven-plugin.md`

Tip: In a chat request, add: “Also follow `.github/copilot-jasypt-spring-boot-starter.md`.”
